summary: A thirty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.
cast: Diane Lane|John Cusack|Elizabeth Perkins|Christopher Plummer|Dermot Mulroney|Stockard Channing|Ali Hillis|Brad William Henke|Julie Gonzalo|Glenn Howerton|Ben Shenkman|Jordana Spiro|Kirk Trutner|Victor Webster|Michael Spound|Will McCormack|Ted Griffin|Marylouise Burke|Brad Hall|Bobby Coleman|Emma Prescott|Jaden Sorensen|Will Rothhaar|Tony Bill|Patrick St. Esprit|Josh Stamberg|Anoush NeVart|Krikor Satamian|Jon Lindstrom|Patrick Fabian|Steve Schirripa|Bess Wohl|Laura Kightlinger|Rubria Negrao|Colin Egglesfield|Suzy Nakamura|Jamie Denbo|Miles Hull|Amy Kidd|Ted Detwiler|Kate McClafferty|Shana Hiatt|Mary Anne McGarry|Justin Born|Mary Castro|Rose Davidson|Julie Dretzin|Michelle Fabiano|Darrell Geer|Trevor Stevens
title: ...Y que le gusten los perros
